price: İşte hakkında şüpheye düştükleri Meryem oğlu İsa hak söze göre budur.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَۖ قَوۡلَ ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿīsā ub'nu maryama qawla al-ḥaqi alladhī fīhi yamtarūna
